AND M.ID LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{contentKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY B.NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.WRITER_ID = M.ID) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.ID LIKE '%' || #{writerKeyword} || '%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{titleKeyword} || '%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{contentKeyword} || '%'

SELECT B.NO, B.TITLE, B.WRITER_ID, B.READCOUNT, B.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B.RENAMED_FILENAME, B.CONTENT, B.TYPE, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, R.NO AS R_BOARD_NO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, M2.ID AS R_ID, R.CREATE_DATE AS R_CREATE_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE AS R_MODIFY_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.WRITER_ID = M.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON(B.NO = R.BOARD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.WRITER_ID = M2.ID) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.NO=#{no}
